headline: No future growth
pros:
1. Work will not be that difficult, so you will get job stability if you're ready to the repeatetive work for years. 
2. General pros like insurance, salary on time and total of 21 leaves a year.
3. HR's are dumb as usual, nothing new but they do listen sometimes to your problem and can solve for it, like close friend took help in claiming medical insurance and third party was not passing the claim. So, HR did some good work in that case.
cons:
1. As I mentioned, no growth can be expected as there will be repeatetive work you will doing. My boss spent 10 years in company and he was doing same work for 8 years before he left.
2. Office politics (though it depends on dept to dept) but assss-lickers do get favour over hard workers.
3. No innovative business models, just old traditional ones - " Give loans directly to some shady builders and earn interest on it" and then covering NPA's by making shell companies. So, if you like this work, go for Edelweiss or if you like the growth and money, staw away from this company
4. Average salary and almost no salary hikes. I didn't get any salary hike for 2 years (along with rest of the department in case you're wondering if I was even eligible for), though they were pretty generous in giving bonuses (as what I have heard from some colleagues) when business were going smooth but those days are over. So, don't join in hope for bonus or even salary hikes.
5.Strict dress code. They do make a big deal if you're wearing complete formal attire, but not what they expected and you will be getting good lecture over this!
Though girls have literally freedom to wear anything, several times it was not even formal. So, girls can chill and boys must have to wear formal as per their requirements.

headline: Sinking ship as far as Markets Division is concerned
pros: Best reasons to work are now a matter of past
cons:
The new management is extremely ordinary, lacks leadership qualities. Good people started leaving right after the departure of previous floor head. People who come to office for cheap politics, undisciplined chaps and non-profit generating teams are finding current atmosphere as heaven. They have been treated tightly in the past but now they are all now spreading their dirt across because there is no one to check them. Present management is too insecure about themselves.

There is not even a single senior guy on floor with whom you can talk some logical stuff. Even if there is one then you will find him too angry from the firm for obvious reasons. 

The people who actually generate profits are not paid fairly. The people who recently lost money crazily walked away with better bonuses just because they had good relationship with team head and his head (both of them I will say hopeless).

Very strict advice to Juniors - fresh grads and 1-3 years work exp. category - Do not buy their bonus story which they try to sell while making you to compromise on fixed salary hike. They want a horse at a price of donkey so that donkeys there can keep earning well and yes, they have been lucky so far. 

When you join them from college, that is how it goes:
 - You remain tensed in first year that you are at the bottom among your batch mates as far as fixed salary is concerned
- They keep showing you dream of better pay-off which they keep delaying year-on-year
- While having a dream in your mind for a big bonus, you will keep spending hours and hours in office
- Other old chaps will keep copying your stuff
- Finally, you will not get credit for whatever you do as same has already been copied and secretly presented
- Then on payment day, they will give some random story and one more dream for next year
- You come back home and you criticize why on earth have I not taken this Glassdoor review seriously
- Even by the time you realize your past mistake to join and spend time in this firm, it has been too late
- The atmosphere has already made you unemployable. Rest of the smart firms know the truth of this firm. They will never hire you. Even headhunters make fun of the interviews being conducted in Kalina office.
- Their offer letters are the biggest jokes. You tell them expected number as 11 lakhs, number offered is 4.5 lakhs after wasting so much time in long long interviews.
- Another review that I overheard while sitting on my desk is that - One reason why this firm conducts so many interviews is that they try to extract market information / trading strategies from experienced people
- Extremely unprofessional people riding the wave that previous heads set-up
